title: Was this ban deserved?! New meta got me banned again!1!! You won't believe this...
body:
On the 04.0.7 my account got out of a 14-Day Suspension. Everyone seems to be mindlessly following the "no adc meta", to the point where I get an ADC {{champion:82}}  already at 2/12 @ 20 mins. So am I really supposed to keep my cool after that? After 2 days I'm permanently banned because of this.
